name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FocusFlow - AI Assisted, Distraction Free Productivity Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI assited productivity tool that helps you focus on your work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusFlow adapts to you, making it easier to stay in control of your online habits.

FEATURES
- Block distracting websites
- Provide AI assisted suggestions when you visit distracting websites
- Provide you with a distraction score for each website
- Allow manual configuration of the blocking rules


PRIVACY
Staying focused is important, but so is keeping your data secure. FocusFlow operates entirely on your device, meaning all data related to your browsing habits and productivity preferences stays local. We do not collect or store your browsing data on external servers, and no sensitive information ever leaves your computer. There are no trackers, and we donâ€™t share your information with any third parties.
